breakingChangesNotes:
This release deprecates several incident-related commands and playbooks as CrowdStrike transitions from incident-based to case-based workflows.

**Deprecated Commands:**
- **cs-falcon-resolve-incident** - Use cs-falcon-resolve-case instead
- **cs-falcon-list-incident-summaries** - Use cs-falcon-list-case-summaries instead
- **cs-falcon-get-incident-behavior** - No replacement available
- **cs-falcon-get-detections-for-incident** - Use cs-falcon-get-evidence-for-case instead

**Deprecated Playbooks:**
The following playbooks are deprecated with no current available replacement and will go fully out of commission in March 2026:
- CrowdStrike Falcon - False Positive Incident Handling
- CrowdStrike Falcon - Get Detections by Incident
- CrowdStrike Falcon - SIEM ingestion Get Incident Data
- CrowdStrike Falcon - True Positive Incident Handling
- CrowdStrike Falcon Malware - Incident Enrichment
- CrowdStrike Falcon Malware - Investigation and Response

**New Commands:**
The following case-based commands have been added as replacements:
- cs-falcon-add-case-tag
- cs-falcon-get-evidence-for-case
- cs-falcon-delete-case-tag
- cs-falcon-list-case-summaries
- cs-falcon-resolve-case

**Impact:** Users relying on the deprecated incident-based commands and playbooks should migrate to the new case-based commands. Custom playbooks and automations using the deprecated commands will need to be updated. The deprecated playbooks will be removed in March 2026.
